decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (ASB373 - 01, LOCATION PLAN. Received: 22/08/2016. ASB373 - 02B. Received: 24/01/2017. Workplace Travel Plan March 2017. Received: 24/02/2017. Delivery & Serving Plan March 2017, Transport Statement March 2017. Received: 10/03/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for a nursery and for no
other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1
of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning
(Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent
to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for nursery purposes shall not
be carried on outside the following times 06:00 - 20:00 Monday to Friday.

Condition : 5 - No deliveries shall be taken at or despatched from the
site outside the hours of 06:00 - 20:00 nor at any time
on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 6 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the submitted Workplace Travel Plan February 2017 and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 7 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the submitted Delivery & Servicing Plan March 2017 and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 8 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 9 - Before first occupation of the buildings the car parking spaces (including spaces for people with disabilities) shall be provided within the curtilage of the site in accordance with the scheme shown on drawing No. ASB373 - 02B and such spaces shall be permanently available and not be used for any other purpose.

Condition : 10 - Before the development hereby approved is first occupied, the developer shall provide secure covered cycle parking in the location shown on the approved plans for no less than twelve bicycles. The approved facilities shall conform the Transport for London 'London Cycling Design Standards' in design and layout.
description: Change of use of ground floor from offices (B1 use) to a day nursery (D1 use).
